title: The Republican Civil War & the Man With a Plan: Evan McMullin, Annie Karni and Jake Sherman
description: "I already have a family and a religion and so I've never looked at my political party to replace either," 2016 presidential candidate Evan McMullin says. He tells Chuck Todd about his explorations into a new faction of the GOP ... and possibly a third party. NYT's Annie Karni and Punchbowl's Jake Sherman join to discuss President Biden's To-Do list.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
